Author: fr0gcodes
Text: panera is great because everything is so customizable. they have these little tablet things that you can choose your meal on and remove/add certain things to it. it even gives you calorie counts for everything. same with chipotle!

Author: sweatysensualwoman
Text: I usually only go out for brunch and a lot of places will allow you to sub for egg whites for a few dollars extra when ordering omelettes or eggs, which is safe enough for me.  For dinner, salads are safe if you ask for dressing on the side, and tomato/broth based soups are good
